attributes.action: M.P.s should not vote on military action if they could gain financially from it.
attributes.additional_details: M.P.s can be influenced by financial or, political gain.
attributes.background: The recent vote in Parliament to bomb Syria.

rejection.details:
We're not sure what action you would like to see. The House of Commons already has rules about MPs' financial interests. The full rules are set out in the House of Commons Code of Conduct:

http://www.publications.parliament.uk/pa/cm201516/cmcode/1076/1076.pdf

If there is a specific change that you would like to be made to the rules, you could start a petition asking for that change.
